1.text: Innate: Pyke gains 1 bonus movement speed while in the river.
1.html: Innate: Pyke gains 1 bonus movement speed while in the river.

2.text: Innate: Pyke stores 9% (+ 0.2% per 1 Lethality) of the post-mitigation damage he takes from enemy  champions as grey health on his health bar, increased to 40% (+ 0.4% per 1 Lethality) while there are two or more  visible enemy champions nearby. He can store up to 80 (+ 800% bonus AD) grey health, with an upper cap of 55% of his maximum health.
2.html: Innate: Pyke stores 9% (+ 0.2% per 1 Lethality) of the post-mitigation damage he takes from enemy champions as grey health on his health bar, increased to 40% (+ 0.4% per 1 Lethality) while there are two or more visible enemy champions nearby. He can store up to 80 (+ 800% bonus AD) grey health, with an upper cap of 55% of his maximum health.
markedPassages: champions
visible

3.text: While Pyke is not  visible to enemies, he rapidly consumes his grey health to  heal for the same amount.
3.html: While Pyke is not visible to enemies, he rapidly consumes his grey health to heal for the same amount.
markedPassages: visible
heal

0.text: Active: Pyke  charges while being  slowed by 20% for up to 3 seconds to increase Bone Skewer's  range over the first second of the channel. Bone Skewer can be recast within the duration.
0.html: Active: Pyke charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 3 seconds to increase Bone Skewer's  range over the first second of the channel. Bone Skewer can be recast within the duration.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range

1.text: Recast: Pyke hurls his harpoon in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and  pulls them, during which they are also  revealed, then  slows them by 90% for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Pyke hurls his harpoon in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and pulls them, during which they are also revealed, then slows them by 90% for 1 second.
markedPassages: pulls
revealed
slows

2.text: Releasing the ability within 0.4 seconds causes Pyke to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy  champion, or closest enemy otherwise.
2.html: Releasing the ability within 0.4 seconds causes Pyke to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy champion, or closest enemy otherwise.
markedPassages: champion

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Bone Skewer is cancelled and the ability is put on  full cooldown but refunds  75% of the mana cost. Bone Skewer's mana cost is fully refunded if it hits an enemy champion.
3.html: If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Bone Skewer is cancelled and the ability is put on  full cooldown but refunds  75% of the mana cost. Bone Skewer's mana cost is fully refunded if it hits an enemy champion.
markedPassages: interrupted
full
75% of the mana cost

0.text: Active: Pyke submerges into water for 5 seconds, entering  camouflage and gaining  40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality) bonus movement speed that decays over the duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends Ghostwater Dive immediately.
0.html: Active: Pyke submerges into water for 5 seconds, entering camouflage and gaining  40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality) bonus movement speed that decays over the duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends Ghostwater Dive immediately.
markedPassages: camouflage
40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality) bonus movement speed

1.text: Enemy champions within 1500 units of Pyke are alerted of his presence and whether he can execute them with  Death from Below.
1.html: Enemy champions within 1500 units of Pyke are alerted of his presence and whether he can execute them with Death from Below.
markedPassages: Death from Below
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemy champions within 1500 units of Pyke are alerted of his presence and whether he can execute them with  Death from Below.

0.text: Active: Pyke  dashes in the target direction, leaving behind a Phantom.
0.html: Active: Pyke dashes in the target direction, leaving behind a Phantom.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: After 1 second, the Phantom homes back to Pyke to  stun enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for 1.25 (+ 0.1 per 10 Lethality) seconds. Enemy champions hit also take physical damage.
1.html: After 1 second, the Phantom homes back to Pyke to stun enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for 1.25 (+ 0.1 per 10 Lethality) seconds. Enemy champions hit also take physical damage.
markedPassages: stun

0.text: Active: Pyke marks the target location with an X before striking it,  executing enemy  champions within the area that are below 250 − 550 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 1.5 per 1 Lethality)  health. Other enemies hit and enemy champions above the threshold are instead dealt「 50% of the amount as physical damage. 」「 125 − 275 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 0.75 per 1 Lethality) physical damage. 」

1.text: If Death from Below hits an enemy  champion or at least one is killed inside the X by the execution or an ally, Pyke will  blink to the center of the X. For the latter case Pyke can also recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost.
1.html: If Death from Below hits an enemy champion or at least one is killed inside the X by the execution or an ally, Pyke will blink to the center of the X. For the latter case Pyke can also recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost.
markedPassages: champion
blink

2.text: Each successful execution grants one  Your Cut to the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist  gold. In addition, Pyke is granted a  Your Cut for each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally during Death from Below's cast time.
2.html: Each successful execution grants one Your Cut to the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, Pyke is granted a Your Cut for each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally during Death from Below's cast time.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+3 attack damage
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Runesteel Spaulders, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+10 Lethality (6.22 − 10 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Blackout: When near an enemy stealthed ward or trap, gain Blackout for 8 seconds (50 second cooldown; 400 range).
You disable surrounding stealthed wards, as well as expose and reveal nearby stealthed wards and traps while Blackout is active.
Unique: Your basic attacks deal ( 2 / 1) bonus true damage to wards.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – BLACKOUT: When near an enemy stealthed  ward or  trap, gain Blackout for 8 seconds (50 second cooldown; 400 range).
You  disable surrounding stealthed wards, as well as  expose and  reveal nearby stealthed wards and traps while Blackout is active.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  500

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 / 55) (+ ( 30% / 25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus movement speed and 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 /  55) (+ ( 30% /  25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a  takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
